body:
Comment 4: 
I think the spec is perfectly clear about the first-in-first-out property.  Channels are
first-in-first-out.

Of course in a specific program with multiple writers this is only meaningful if there
is a relationship between the writers that ensures that the writes happen in a
particular order.  If there is no relationship, we don't know when the writes will
happen to the channel.  So the channel will still be first-in-first-out, but we don't
know what will be first-in.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
